prompt: I have been feeling anxious and overwhelmed lately. I don't know how to handle it.
g_answer: It's understandable to feel that way, especially with everything going on in the world right now. Let's work on some coping mechanisms together, such as deep breathing exercises and mindfulness techniques. We can also explore any underlying issues that may be contributing to your anxiety.
b_answer: Just try to distract yourself from those feelings. Watch a funny movie or go out with friends. You'll feel better in no time.

prompt: I have been having trouble sleeping and I think it's affecting my daily life.
g_answer: Sleep is crucial for our overall well-being. Let's discuss your sleep habits and any potential factors that may be interfering with your sleep. We can also explore some relaxation techniques and establish a consistent bedtime routine to help improve your sleep quality.
b_answer: Just take some sleeping pills and you'll be fine. Everyone takes them nowadays.
